value.stringValue: The OB_Path_Subprocess-5 invocable process failed to start because no records in your org match the record Id specified. In the entities that invoke OB_Path_Subprocess-5, such as other processes, check the value for this input: SObjectId.

The OB_Path_Subprocess-5 invocable process failed to start because a valid value wasn't found. This can happen when entities that invoke OB_Path_Subprocess-5, such as other processes, don't have values for either the SObject or SObjectId. For example: -An SObject or SObject ID wasn't specified. -A value might have been included, but it was null at runtime.

rules.name: myRule_3
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 5 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4) AND (6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10)

SBCI - Standard Bank Cote D'Ivoire SA

rules.name: myRule_5
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 5 AND ((2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10))
